title: Did Bill Maher, Megyn Kelly Argue Kids Shouldn’t Be Burdened With Race Issues?
subtitle: "It bothers me so much that I have to be on this side of this issue because I've always been a civil rights advocate," Maher told Kelly. "Don't make me Tucker Carlson," he added.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Bill Maher and Megyn Kelly argued that 8- and 9-year-olds shouldn't be burdened with race issues.
